channel.title: Old Oregon Trail Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Old Oregon Trail Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-30 West Approaching I-84
item.description: US-30 West approaching I-84 (Exit 376AB) in Ontario

item.title: I-84 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 east. Distance to Rest Area, Baker City, and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 270
item.description: I-84/US-30 east approaching Exit 270 - Ladd Creek Road. No return to the freeway eastbound on Exit 270.

item.title: River Lane East at US-30 East And Approaching I-84
item.description: River Lane East at US-30 East to Haines. Approaching onramp for I-84. Use I-84 east to Baker City; I-84 West/US-30 West for La Grande. OR-237 North begins at the I-84 interchange. Use OR-237 for North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 353 Offramp
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 353 offramp at US-30. Use US-30 west for Farewell Bend State Park. Turn left for Birch Creek Road and (I-84) Freeway.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 356
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 356 - OR-201/Weiser (Idaho).

item.title: I-84 East Exit 234 Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-84 East Exit 234 Freeway Entrance. Use I-84 east for LaGrande. Continue west on Frontage Road for (Emigrant Springs) State Park and I-84 west to Pendleton.

item.title: Emigrant Springs State Park Road at Frontage Road
item.description: Emigrant Springs State Park Road at Frontage Road. Turn right for access to I-84 east to La Grande; left for access to I-84 west to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 at Mecham Interchange
item.description: I-84/US-30 at Mecham Interchange. Continue straight for Kamela; turn left for Mecham.

item.title: I-84 West (Exit 248) Offramp at Spring Creek Road
item.description: I-84 West (Exit 248) Offramp at Spring Creek Road. Turn right for Kamela; left for Spring Creek Road.

item.title: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 West in Umatilla County. Use I-84/US-30 west to Portland. Continue north on OR-207 for Hermiston, McNary Dam, and Umatilla Bridge.

item.title: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 East
item.description: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 East. Use I-84/US-30 East to Pendleton; continue north on OR-207 for Hermiston and Boardman (via I-84/US-30 West).

item.title: OR-207 North Approaching I-84/US-30
item.description: OR-207 North approaching I-84/US-30 (Exit 182) in Umatilla County.

item.title: I-84/US-30 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on I-84/US-30 West in Stanfield. Distance to OR 207, The Dalles, and Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 304 Offramp at OR-7
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 304 offramp at OR-7 in Baker City. Turn left on OR-7 west to Sumpter.

item.title: I-84 West - Entering Baker City
item.description: Entering Baker City on I-84 West. Baker City is the county seat of Baker County, Oregon.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 317
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 317 - Pleasant Valley.

item.title: I-84 - Exit 228 Onramp
item.description: I-84 - Exit 228 onramp. Use I-84 west to Pendleton; I-84 east to La Grande.

item.title: I-84 West - Variable Speed Limits
item.description: Variable Speed Limit sign on I-84 West, just outside of Baker City. The stretch of I-84 between Baker City and Ladd Canyon converted to variable speed limits in 2016.

item.title: I-84 - Exit 228 Onramp
item.description: I-84 - Exit 228 onramp. Use I-84 west to Pendleton; I-84 east to La Grande. The I-84 shield has the text OREGON in it, although it does not fit well with the rest of the font. This is the first time in the last 20 years I have lived in the northwest that I have seen an interstate shield with the text OREGON in it.

item.title: I-84 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 west. Distance to Baker City, La Grande, and Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 west. Distance to Durkee, Baker City, and La Grande.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 356
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 356 - OR-201/Weiser (Idaho).

item.title: I-84 West Offramp at US-30/Bus. US-30 - Ontario
item.description: I-84 West Offramp at US-30/Bus. US-30 Junction in Ontario. Turn right for Bus. US-30 to US-26/US-26/Ontario/Vale/Lake Owyhee.

item.title: End OR-244 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-244 at I-84/US-30 at Hilgard Junction. Merge right for I-84/US-30 East to LaGrande; merge left for I-84/US-30 west to Hilgard and Pendleton.

item.title: End OR-7 East Approaching I-84 West
item.description: End OR-7 East approaching I-84 West to Richland (via OR-86), Hells Canyon (via OR-86) and La Grande.

item.title: End OR-7 East at I-84 East
item.description: End OR-7 East at I-84 East. Turn right for I-84 east to Ontario; straight for I-84 west to La Grande and (Oregon Trail) Interpretive Center.

item.title: Begin OR-11 North at I-84
item.description: Begin OR-11 north at I-84 onramp. Turn right for I-84 east to La Grande; continue straight for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and for I-84 west onramp to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: End OR-203 North at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 north at I-84/US-30. Turn left for I-84 west; continue under freeway for I-84 east.

item.title: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left for I-84 west to Pendleton; continue straight for I-84 east, and US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West at I-84 and OR-237
item.description: US-30 west at I-84 and OR-237. US-30 joins I-84 west to La Grande. Continue straight for OR-237 and North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: End OR-86 West at I-84
item.description: End OR-86 at I-84 (Exit 302). Use I-84 west for La Grande. Use I-84 east for Baker City and Ontario.

item.title: OR-86 West at I-84
item.description: OR-86 west at OR-203 (not signed) to Medical Springs and Airport.

item.title: US-30 East at I-84 (Exit 306)
item.description: US-30 east at I-84 (Exit 306) onramp. US-30 joins I-84 east to Huntington. This is the eastern entrance to Baker City. Use I-84 East/US-30 East for Ontario. Use I-84 West for La Grande.

item.title: End Bus. US-30 At I-84/US-30
item.description: End Business US-30 at I-84 and US-30. Turn left for I-84/US-30 West to Baker City. Continue ahead for US-30 east to Payette (Idaho). The bluff in the background of the picture is in Idaho.

item.title: End Business US-30 at I-84 and US-30
item.description: End Business US-30 East at I-84 and US-30. Turn left for I-84/US-30 West for Baker City. Continue ahead for US-30 East to Payette (Idaho).

item.title: I-84 East - Umatilla Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering the Umatilla Indian Reservation on I-84 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 209 - US-395 South/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stansfield.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 207 - US-30/Airport/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District. US-30 leaves I-84 here, serving as the Pendleton business loop. US-30 rejoins I-84 on the east side of Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 199
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 199 - Stage Gulch/Yoakum Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 198
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 198 - Lorenzen Road/McClintock Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 188
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 188 - US-395 North/Stanfield/Echo. US-395 south joins I-84/US-30 east to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 182
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 182 - OR-207/Hermiston/Lexington.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 180
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 180 - Westland Road/Hermiston.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 180
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 180 - Westland Road/Hermiston.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 179 - I-82 West/Hermiston/Umatilla. I-84/US-30 continues east towards Pendleton and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 179 (I-82 West). Use I-82 west for Kennewick (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Umatilla County
item.description: Entering Umatilla County on I-84 east.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 179 - I-82 West/Hermiston/Umatilla.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 177
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 177 - Umatilla Army Depot. The Umatilla Army Depot is one of the few sites in the United States that store chemical weapons.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 171
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 171 - Patterson Ferry Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 168
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 168 - US-730/Irrigon. The internal Oregon State Highway 2 - The Columbia River Highway leaves I-84 here and joins US-730. I-84 continues east as Oregon State Highway 6 - The Old Oregon Trail Highway.

item.title: I-84 East - Blowing Dust Area
item.description: Blowing Dust Area next 40 miles on I-84 east. This area is roughly between Boardman and Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker at Boardman Interchange. Distance to US-730 Jct., Pendleton, and La Grande.

item.title: Route Diagram at US-395 North/US-730 Junction
item.description: Route diagram at US-395 north/US-730 junction. US-730 heads east to Walla Walla. US-395 North joins US-730 West into Umatilla. Continue straight for McNary Dam on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 202
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 202 - Barnhart Road/Airport Road. This was renamed in 2009 from Barnhart Road/Stage Gulch with the completion of a connector road to the Pendleton Airport.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 168
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 168 - US-730/Irrigon

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 171
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 171 - Patterson Ferry Road

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 177 - Umatilla Army Depot

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 213 - US-30/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 257
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 257 - Perry

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 257 - Perry

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 353
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 353 - Farewell Bend State Park.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Mountain Time Zone
item.description: I-84 East - Entering Mountain Time.

item.title: I-84 East at Exit 345 Offramp - US-30 Jct.
item.description: I-84 East at Exit 345 Offramp at US-30 Jct. Turn left for US-30 east to Huntington and Lime.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Baker County
item.description: I-84 east at the North Powder River. Entering Baker County.

item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 261 - OR-82/La Grande/Elgin.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 259
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario.

item.description: Route diagram of La Grande routes on I-84 east approaching Exit 261.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 248 - Spring Creek Road.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 243
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 243 - Summit Road/Mount Emily.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 238 - Meacham/Kamela.

item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 238 - Meacham.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 234 - Emigrant Springs State Park.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 228 - Deadman Pass.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 210 - OR-11/Pendleton/Milton-Freewater.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-84
item.description: US-395 north approaching I-84. Use left lane for I-84 West/US-395 North to Pasco and Spokane (both in Washington via US-395).

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 208 - US-395 South/OR-37/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stanfield, Oregon.

item.title: US-30 at I-84/US-395 Exit 207 Westbound Onramp
item.description: US-30 East at onramp to I-84/US-30 West/US-395 North to Portland (Exit 207).

item.title: US-30 at I-84/US-395 Exit 207 Onramp
item.description: US-30 east at I-84 (Exit 207) onramp. Merge right for I-84 East/US-395 South to La Grande; continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 West/US-395 North, and for (Pendleton) Airport, (Blue Mountain) Community College, and (Pendleton) City Center.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207 Offramp at US-30 Jct
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 207 offramp. Turn left for US-30 west to (Pendleton) Airport, Blue Mountain Community College, and (Pendleton) City Center. Turn right for Justice Center.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 207 - US-30 East/Airport/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District.

item.title: I-84 East/US-30 East/US-395 South Overhead
item.description: I-84/US-30 East/US-395 South overhead in Umatilla County.

item.title: I-82 East Approaching I-84
item.description: I-82 east approaching I-84. Use I-84 west to The Dalles and Hood River; use I-84 east to LaGrande and Ontario.

item.title: I-82 East Approaching I-84
item.description: I-82 east approaching I-84. Use right lane for I-84 west to Portland.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 10 Approaching I-84
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 10 - Westland Road. Approaching I-84 to Portland and Pendleton.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 179 - I-82 West/Kennewick/Umatilla. Continue west on I-84/US-30 to The Dalles and Portland.

item.description: I-84 West approaching Exit 179. Use I-82 West (Exit 179) for Yakima and Spokane (both in Washington).

item.description: Bus. US-30 east at I-84 east to Boise - I-84 west to Baker, and US-30 east to Payette.

item.description: I-84 west at first Oregon distance marker on I-84 to Baker City and Portland (371 miles).

item.title: I-84 West - Speed 65
item.description: I-84, just west of Oregon-Idaho line - Speed 65. The top speed in Oregon is 65, 10 miles less than Idaho. Notice Oregon does not use the word limit in the speed limit signs.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on I-84 west at the ID-OR state line. The welcome sign on this border has an Oregon Trail theme.

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 374, OR-201/To US-20/To US-26/Weiser/Vale, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 374 - Ontario SRA
item.description: Ontario State Rec. Site and Lake Owyhee State Park use Exit 374, next exit on I-84 west.

item.description: I-84 west at Exit 376A, Bus. US-30/Ontario.

item.title: I-84 West Exit376AB
item.description: I-84 west at Oregon Welcome Center. Approaching Exit 376AB, US-30 east to Payette, and the Bus. US-30 to Ontario. First Oregon exit on westbound I-84.

item.title: I-84 West Exit376B - First Oregon Exit
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 376B, US-30 East/Payette.

item.title: I-84 West at Exit 374 - OR-201 To US-20/US-26
item.description: I-84 west Exit 374 offramp at OR-201. Use OR-201 north for Payette (ID) and Weiser (ID). Use OR-201 south for Ontario, Vale and US-20/US-26.

item.title: I-84 at Exit 374 - OR-201/Bus. US-30 Jct.
item.description: I-84 East (Exit 374) offramp at OR-201/Bus. US-30 Jct. Use OR-201 north to State Park, Payette (Idaho), and Weiser (Idaho). Use OR-201 South/Bus. US-30 for Ontario.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 376
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 376A and B. Use Exit 376A for US-20/US-26 to Lake Owyhee. Use Exit 376B for State Police.

item.title: I-84/US-30 Exit 283 Onramp
item.description: I-84/US-30 freeway entrance to Baker City/LaGrande. Taken at the Exit 283 - Wolf Creek Lane onramp. The Blue Mountains are in the background.

item.title: I-84/US-30 Exit 335 Onramp
item.description: I-84/US-30 freeway entrance to Ontario/Baker City. Taken at Exit 335 - Weatherby.

item.title: To I-84 Freeway - Weatherby Rest Area
item.description: To I-84 Freeway leaving the Weatherby Rest Area.

item.title: I-84 at Exit 182 - OR-207 Jct.
item.description: I-84 Exit 182 offramp at OR-207. Use OR-207 north to Hermiston, McNary Dam, and Umatilla Bridge. Use US-207 south to Lexington.
